page.title: 03At school 50 years ago
page.content: Today Mrs.Boston came to talk to us about Wootton.Mrs.Boston used to teach at Wootton Lower School and has lived here all her life. Across the road from where Mrs.Boston lives there used to be an old school but now there are four houses.When Mrs.Boston was a little girl she used to call it the little school.To get to school Mrs.Boston only had to cross the road .Around the school there was a big wall and Mrs.Boston played throw and catch with a ball. In those days children could play in the road because there was not much traffic at all exept the odd horse and cart or bicyle.Apart from that the roads were empty.In the little school there were two rooms and there was a rickety stair case that led to a teachers flat above the school.
